search.query: index="splunk_checker" source="warning_msg" | rename info{}.severity as Severity | table sourcetype, cluster_id, Severity | dedup cluster_id, sourcetype sortby _time | eval severity_score=case(Severity=="severe", 3, Severity=="elevated", 2, Severity=="unknown", 1, 1==1, 0) | stats max(severity_score) as cluster_score by cluster_id | eval Status=case(cluster_score==3, "severe", cluster_score==2, "elevated", cluster_score==1, "unknown", 1==1, "low") | fields cluster_id, Status

index="splunk_checker" source="warning_msg" cluster_id=$cluster_id$ | rename info{}.message as "Warnings", sourcetype as "Item", info{}.severity as Severity| table Item, Warnings, Severity | dedup Item sortby -_time | eval Status=case(Severity=="severe", "severe", Severity=="elevated", "elevated", Severity=="unknown", "unknown", 1==1, "low")
